title: HTML 动手学（3）
content:
Codecademy HTML 教程学习笔记

Styling Text（格式文本)

使用 HTML 标识符给文字添加格式：

  1. 使用 <em> 标识符表示斜体。
  2. 使用 <strong> 标识符表示加粗。
<p><strong>The Nile River</strong> is the <em>longest</em> river in the world, measuring over 6,850 kilometers long (approximately 4,260 miles).</p>

上述代码在网页中显示为：

The Nile River is the longest river in the world, measuring over 6,850 kilometers long (approximately 4,260 miles).

Line Breaks（断行）

使用 <br> 将一段文字分为多行。

<p>The Nile River is the longest river <br> in the world, measuring over 6,850 <br> kilometers long (approximately 4,260 <br> miles).</p>

上述代码在网页中显示为：

The Nile River is the longest river
in the world, measuring over 6,850
kilometers long (approximately 4,260
miles).

注意：<br> 仅有开始标识符，并无结束标识符。

连续使用2个断行符以表示分段。

<p>The brown bear (<em>Ursus arctos</em>) is native to parts of northern Eurasia and North America. Its conservation status is currently <strong>Least Concern</strong>.<br><br> There are many subspecies within the brown bear species, including the Atlas bear and the Himalayan brown bear.</p>

上述代码在网页中显示为：

The brown bear (Ursus arctos) is native to parts of northern Eurasia and North America. Its conservation status is currently Least Concern.

There are many subspecies within the brown bear species, including the Atlas bear and the Himalayan brown bear.

Unordered Lists（无序列表）

使用 <ul> 标识符建立一个无序列表。

<ul> 中不能包含纯文本，列表中的每个元素应包含在 <li> 标识符中。<li> 标识符表示列表元素（list item）标识符。

<ul>
  <li>Limes</li>
  <li>Tortillas</li>
  <li>Chicken</li>
</ul>

上述代码在网页中显示为：

  • Limes
  • Tortillas
  • Chicken

Ordered Lists（有序列表）

使用 <ol> 标识符建立一个有序列表，列表中的每个元素应包含在 <li> 标识符中。

<ol>
  <li>Preheat the oven to 350 degrees.</li>
  <li>Mix whole wheat flour, baking soda, and salt.</li>
  <li>Cream the butter, sugar in separate bowl.</li>
  <li>Add eggs and vanilla extract to bowl.</li>
</ol>

上述代码在网页中显示为：

  1. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees.
  2. Mix whole wheat flour, baking soda, and salt.
  3. Cream the butter, sugar in separate bowl.
  4. Add eggs and vanilla extract to bowl.
